title: Ali Wong hilariously references her on-screen romance with Keanu Reeves
text:
Their relationship may have ran its course in their Netflix film, but that doesn't mean that Ali Wong and her famous on-screen ex Keanu Reeves can't poke fun at what used to be.

The 37-year-old stand-up comedian took to Instagram over the weekend to share a photo of her and the John Wick star as he attended her Los Angeles show at the Wiltern.

Both stars smiled at the camera before adding in the caption that the two would never get back together.

Former flames: Ali Wong took to Instagram over the weekend to share a photo of her and her ex boyfriend Keanu Reeves as he attended her Los Angeles show at the Wiltern

'My ex-boyfriend came to the show. I told him it's never gonna work,' she wrote in as a funny nod to her ex and their movie together.

Ali had her hair up in a half pony tail while sporting a pair of stylish frames and a small emerald-colored necklace.

The 55-year-old gave a big smile as he displayed his long dark hair and growing beard.

Back then: Keanue and Ali smile at the premiere for their Netflix movie, Always Be My Maybe back in May 2019

The stars played each other's love interests in the hit Netflix film, Always Be My Maybe to life.

In the film, Keanu played an exaggerated version of himself in the throes of a passionate - yet brief - relationship with Wong.

While their romance is something that will only live on Netflix, Ali has been happily married to her husband Justin Hakuta since 2014 and together they have their daughter, Mari.

Happy: The two smile while posing together for an event for their movie, Always Be My maybe

The writer has been on the road for her Milk & Honey tour for the past couple of week with other famous names stepping out for the occasion like Daniel Dae Kim, Mahershala Ali, and America Ferrera.

And that's not all, she's also gearing up for her new role in the next Harley Quinn film starring Margot Robbie, Birds of Prey.

Meanwhile, Keanu will be heading back to film Bill & Ted Face the Music which is slated for a 2020 release date.
